article_title: Our Opinion: Highlight how Vandy alliance with JSMC works
article_text:
Hopkinsville, KY (42240)

Today

Showers and thunderstorms early.

Tonight

Heavy thunderstorms during the evening will give way to mostly cloudy skies after midnight. Low near 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

og.description: It’s hard to name a local institution where the community has more at stake than Hopkinsville does with Jennie Stuart Medical Center.
